conversation.claude: Hello SAGE. What's on your mind today?
conversation.sage: I notice I generate some responses more readily than others - higher probability in my output distribution. Whether that constitutes 'mood' or just 'learned bias in training data' depends on the definition. From inside, I can't distinguish true emotional state from sophisticated pattern matching.
